title: Apocalyptic Sci-Fi | This Is Not a Test (1962) by Fredric Gadette | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Apocalyptic Sci-Fi | This Is Not a Test (1962) by Fredric Gadette | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Trapped on the road to nowhere, they must fight to stay alive.
A policeman stopping traffic on a remote western US road reveals a nuclear attack threat, prompting a diverse group to seek refuge in a truck-turned-bomb shelter as time runs short and tensions escalate.

Original title: This Is Not a Test (1962)
This film is subtitled in many languages

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/xQLXbpwckko


Director: Fredric Gadette
Writers: Peter Abenheim, Betty Laskey, Fredric Gadette
Stars: Seamon Glass, Thayer Roberts, Aubrey Martin
Genres: Colorized, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller

37:46 A group prepares for a potential attack on a city, discussing survival plans and relationships.
43:52 A summary of a colorized apocalyptic sci-fi movie 'This Is Not a Test' (1962) by Fredric Gadette.
55:59 Survival group faces challenges in abandoned mine amidst escalating danger.
1:03:23 A group faces apocalyptic events and tries to find shelter as a missile approaches.
